### Education

BSc in Marine Biology, Universidad Jorge Tadeo Lozano, Colombia

---

### Research interests

Historical ecology on coral reefs

---

### Current research

*Historical analysis of disturbances to coral reefs in the Southern Great Barrier Reef: Linking processes of growth and mortality to environmental factors.*

Principal Advisor Prof Jian-xin Zhao; Associate Advisor: Dr Ke-fu Yu (UQ), Associate Advisor: Prof John M. Pandolfi (UQ).
